lead_paragraph: The authorities still use violent interrogation methods to crush dissent and extract confessions, despite pledges to eradicate torture, a new report by the rights group says.

headline.main: Torture Still Widely Used in Morocco, Amnesty International Says

snippet: The authorities still use violent interrogation methods to crush dissent and extract confessions, despite pledges to eradicate torture, a new report by the rights group says.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
